name: Mr. Miles Sniffing Adventures
description:
Mr. Miles is a top detective who enjoy chasing the most interesting cases. On one day, on his office, Mr.Miles notices the news about missing dogs around the neighborhood. He decided to investigate what is happening and rescue the missing dogs!

Controls

Arrow keys to move and jump.

Z - Dig
X - Bite
C - Bark
V - Sniff

(made with Fychan)
